column4: Latest;Phnom Penh: A female construction worker on the Borey Chip Mong Land  has died tragically after falling from a building.------The death occurred at 2 pm on February 18
column9: Phnom Penh.------According to eyewitnesses at the scene
column10: the woman fell from the construction site
column11: resulting in an accidental death.Â Police arrived to investigate
column12: but have not announced the cause of death. ------NKD------UPDATE:  The victim was identified as Srey Leap
column13: a 32-year-old mother of two. It is reported she was divorced and suffered from a mental breakdown. Cause of death was given as suicide.
